name: Bundetta
description:
Can you fend off hoards of ducks from ruining your picnic? In this freshly baked game fight off ducks by pushing them away from your partner's basket of gluten free goodness!

Can't do it alone? Try two player mode! 

-----------

Controls:

Single-Player:

The System can be controlled with the arrow keys and/or the W,A,S,D keys to move! 

Two-Players:

The blonde haired boy can be controlled with the arrow keys and/or the W,A,S,D keys to move! (Just like single-player!)

The long haired lass is controlled by the number pad to move around anywhere you like. (*See images on sidebar for a visual explanation!)

-----------

This game is dedicated to our partner of 6 years, Statia! - Mia 

We all love you so much, and hope you have fun with this game. - Ethan

Our main goal was to make you smile and laugh, because we just can't get enough of that. - Chris
